name: Journey of a Duck
description:
Made for Taku's Mini Jam.

This is my first solo submission to a game jam.

The light is nearly gone

The road it seems so long

But you keep going on

You belong.

The big and lonely skies

Reflecting in your eyes

And now you realize

It's real

Ohh, ohh...

The past is far away

The future's not today

The present seems to stay

You're floating

The big and lonely skies

Reflecting in your eyes

And now you realize

You're free

Ohh, ohh...

Will you ever arrive?

Or will you always fly?
